properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, B.CATEGORY_NO, M.NICK_NAME AS WRITER, IS_QUESTION, IS_ANONIMOUS, B.RECOMMEND_COUNT, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS USERPROFILE, TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DATE, REPLY_COUNT FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE_IMG ON (REF_USERID = B.WRITER) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, M.NICK_NAME AS WRITER, B.CATEGORY_NO, IS_QUESTION, IS_ANONIMOUS, B.REPORT_COUNT, B.RECOMMEND_COUNT, B.SCRAP_COUNT, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.STATUS, REPLY_COUNT, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS USERPROFILE, B.WRITER AS USER_NO, TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS STRING_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE_IMG ON (REF_USERID = B.WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT $ AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY R WHERE R.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO)
INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY_NO, WRITER, IS_QUESTION, IS_ANONIMOUS) VALUES($ ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? )
INSERT INTO BOARD_ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_BFNO.NEXTVAL ,$ ,? ,? ,? ,^ )
NVL((SELECT MAX(FILE_LEVEL) FROM BOARD_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ?)+1, 0)
SELECT FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, UPLOAD_DATE, FILE_LEVEL, STATUS FROM BOARD_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, IS_QUESTION, IS_ANONIMOUS, B.RECOMMEND_COUNT, B.ENROLL_DATE, REPLY_COUNT
FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.TITLE LIKE ? OR B.CONTENT LIKE ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE ? OR CONTENT LIKE ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, B.CATEGORY_NO, M.NICK_NAME AS WRITER, IS_QUESTION, IS_ANONIMOUS, B.RECOMMEND_COUNT, B.ENROLL_DATE, REPLY_COUNT
FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.RECOMMEND_COUNT > ? AND TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY') = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.RECOMMEND_COUNT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE RECOMMEND_COUNT > ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND ( WRITER = ? AND ? = 'N' OR ? = 0 OR WRITER = ? AND 0 = (SELECT REPLY_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ?) )
UPDATE BOARD_ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE $ ^ ?
UPDATE BOARD SET RECOMMEND_COUNT = RECOMMEND_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND ? != ( SELECT WRITER FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ?)
UPDATE BOARD SET SCRAP_COUNT = SCRAP_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND ? != ( SELECT WRITER FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ?)
SELECT BOARD_NO , TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE RECOMMEND_COUNT > ? AND TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY') = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET REPLY_COUNT = REPLY_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET REPLY_COUNT = REPLY_COUNT - 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = ?, CONTENT = ?, CATEGORY_NO = ?, IS_QUESTION = ?, IS_ANONIMOUS = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND WRITER = ?
SELECT CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NAME LIKE ? AND AVAILABLE = 'Y'
INSERT INTO BOARD_REQ(BOARD_NAME,USER_ID,REASON) VALUES( ? ,? ,? )
INSERT INTO CATEGORY(CATEGORY_NO,CATEGORY_NAME,REQ_USER) VALUES(SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? )
UPDATE BOARD SET REPORT_COUNT = REPORT_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND ? != ( SELECT WRITER FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE WRITER = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, B.CATEGORY_NO, M.NICK_NAME AS WRITER, IS_QUESTION, IS_ANONIMOUS, B.RECOMMEND_COUNT, B.ENROLL_DATE, REPLY_COUNT, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS USERPROFILE, TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS STRING_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE_IMG ON (REF_USERID = B.WRITER) WHERE B.WRITER = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT B.BOARD_NO) COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN REPLY R ON ( R.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE R.WRITER = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, B.CATEGORY_NO, M.NICK_NAME AS WRITER, IS_QUESTION, IS_ANONIMOUS, B.RECOMMEND_COUNT, B.ENROLL_DATE, REPLY_COUNT, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS USERPROFILE, TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS STRING_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE_IMG ON (REF_USERID = B.WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO IN ( SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO FROM REPLY WHERE WRITER = ?) AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT B.BOARD_NO) COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN SCRAP S ON ( S.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, B.CATEGORY_NO, M.NICK_NAME AS WRITER, IS_QUESTION, IS_ANONIMOUS, B.RECOMMEND_COUNT, B.ENROLL_DATE, REPLY_COUNT, TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS STRING_DATE, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS USERPROFILE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE_IMG ON (REF_USERID = B.WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO IN ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM SCRAP WHERE USER_NO = ?) AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE BOARD SET SCRAP_COUNT = SCRAP_COUNT - 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
